text: Oracular Spectacular is the debut studio album by the American band MGMT, It was released on October 2, 2007, by RED Ink and on January 22, 2008, by Columbia. ==Track listing== Notes * An earlier version of "Time to Pretend" appeared on Time to Pretend EP. * An earlier version of "Kids" appeared on We (Don't) Care, Climbing to New Lows and Time to Pretend EP. ==Personnel== * Andrew VanWyngarden – lead vocals, lead and rhythm guitars, synthesizers, bass guitar, drums, percussion * Ben Goldwasser – keyboards, synthesizers, sampling, rhythm guitar, percussion, backing vocals ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2008) Peak position Croatian International Albums (HDU) 34 Japanese Albums (Oricon) 114 Mexican Albums (Top 100 Mexico) 74 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2008) Position Australian Albums (ARIA) 16 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) 35 European Albums (Billboard) 93 French Albums (SNEP) 77 UK Albums (OCC) 65 Chart (2009) Position Australian Albums (ARIA) 85 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) 79 European Albums (Billboard) 94 French Albums (SNEP) 96 US Billboard 200 117 ==Certifications== ==Awards== Title Award Result NME Awards 2009 Best Track of 2009 Won ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2007 albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: Oracular Spectular
